name: PM Kisan Samman Nidhi
description: ₹6000 yearly support for farmers

name: National Food Security Mission

name: Formation & Promotion of FPOs
description: Financial assistance for forming and strengthening Farmer Producer Organizations.

name: Agriculture Infrastructure Fund
description: ₹1 lakh crore fund for post-harvest infrastructure including storage and processing.

name: PMFME
description: Support for millet processing units, value addition, and branding.

name: Organic Certification Support
description: Financial assistance for organic certification of agricultural produce.

name: Price Deficiency Payment Scheme

name: Rashtriya Krishi Vikas Yojana

description: Promote climate-resilient practices and sustainable agriculture.

name: Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana

name: Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchai Yojana
